result.eng: I put all the money on the horse.
result.ga: Chuir mé an t-airgead go léir ar an chapall
result.orig: Chuir mé an t-airgead go léir ar an chapall
result.html: Chuir mé an t-airgead go léir ar an chapallI put all the money on the horse.
result.ponchtml: Ċuir mé an t-airgead go léir ar an ċapallI put all the money on the horse.

result.html: Tá an capall imithe uaimThe horse has left me.
result.ponchtml: Tá an capall imiṫe uaimThe horse has left me.

result.eng: The horse was scratching his foot on the floor.
result.ga: Bhí an capall ag tochas a chos ar an urlár
result.orig: Bhí an capall ag tochas a chos ar an urlár
result.html: Bhí an capall ag tochas a chos ar an urlárThe horse was scratching his foot on the floor.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an capall ag toċas a ċos ar an urlárThe horse was scratching his foot on the floor.
